import React from 'react' import './styles.css'; import { Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; import FacebookIcon from '../../../data/icon/facebookIcon'; import InstagramIcon from '../../../data/icon/instagramIcon'; import SnapChatIcon from '../../../data/icon/snapchatIcon'; const Footer = () => { return (
ADRESSE

33 Avenue du Manet,

78180 Montigny-le-Bretonneux
HORAIRES

Ouvert du Lundi au Samedi

De 11h00 à 22h00
CONTACT

01 72 56 31 08

mettremail@gmail.com
REJOIGNEZ-NOUS !

   

Copyright 2021 © | Made by Ceos Tech | CGV | Mentions Légales

) }; export default Footer;
